items.sentence: Tom didn\'t know how to express his thanks in French.
Tom didn\'t know that Mary was a high school student.
If it were not for water, no one could live on earth.
If you act like a child, you will be treated as such.
Tom will never understand why people don\'t like him.
Tom won\'t likely be able to cope with the situation.
Tom\'s father is Canadian and his mother is Japanese.
Tom\'s father remarried after his mother passed away.
Tom\'s grandfather was a concentration camp survivor.
You shouldn\'t interfere in other people\'s business.
Tom claimed he had nothing to do with Mary\'s murder.
Are you telling me that you can\'t understand French?
Tom and Mary celebrate Christmas together every year.
Tom and Mary claim that they never lie to each other.
Tom and Mary even always wear the same color clothes.
Tom and Mary fell in love and decided to get married.
Tom and Mary got married three months after they met.
I thought Tom would have remembered today\'s meeting.
I suspect that Tom is still in love with his ex-wife.
Tom just announced that he would be moving to Boston.
